channel.title: Can't connect to vps
channel.description:
Not sure if this is in the right section or not but if it is in the wrong section, feel free to correct me.
So I can connect to it via the Control Panel on the website and I turned on Allow Remote Access but on my computers I can't connect to the vps. I press connect and it sits for about 30 seconds trying to connect then says it failed. I checked the router firewall and it's turned off and my pc's firewall is turned off too.
I'm sure I'm just making some stupid mistake that's easily fixable but idk.

item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

Pzezima2:

Wrong Section. But also, are you connecting to it via remote desktop control?

Ya sorry, thought i mentioned that. Remote desktop connection just says connecting for 30 seconds and the says connection failed. Also, what exactly is the right section for this? General discussion doesn’t allow questions and it is related to the server in a way.
